div.a: The Fast N' Loud First Look

p.a: The Fast N' Loud First Look

div.p: Taking old cars and bringing them back to life is their business. Business is good.
The Wyatts return and are ready to go on the range.
The polar icepack descends directly into the path of the fleet.
The dual issues of a new chapter and Gipsy's own endeavor split the club.
Adam reveals where on the brown-note meter his bubble-wrapped fall fell.

div.style: display:block; width:300px; height:auto; margin:0 auto; text-align:center;

div.script: var posts={perRequest:10,featured:{height:{open:800}},recent:{height:{open:0},status:0,start:1},popular:{height:{open:0},status:0,start:1},view:function(tab){jQuery(".content-tabs .tab").removeClass("selected");jQuery("#content-streams .active").fadeOut("fast",function(){jQuery(".content-tabs ."+tab+" .tab").addClass("selected");jQuery("#"+tab+"-posts").fadeIn("fast",function(){var stream="";switch(tab){case "recent":stream=posts.recent;break;case "popular":stream=posts.popular;break;}if(!stream.status && "featured"!=tab){stream.status=1;posts.fetch(tab);}posts.adjust(tab);}).addClass("active");});},fetch:function(tab){var stream="";switch(tab){case "recent":stream=posts.recent;break;case "popular":stream=posts.popular;break;}jQuery("#content-streams .post").removeClass("in-scope-view");jQuery.ajax({async:true,url:"/components/content-stream.html",data:{type:tab,start:stream.start,count:posts.perRequest,content:"homepage"},dataType:"html",success:function(data){jQuery("#"+tab+"-posts .body").append(data);stream.start=stream.start+posts.perRequest;posts.adjust(tab);posts.comments();}});},adjust:function(tab){var stream="";switch(tab){case "recent":stream=posts.recent;stream.height.open=jQuery("#recent-posts").height();jQuery("#content-streams").css("height",stream.height.open);break;case "featured":stream=posts.featured;stream.height.open=jQuery("#featured-posts").height();jQuery("#content-streams").css("height",stream.height.open);break;case "popular":stream=posts.popular;stream.height.open=jQuery("#popular-posts").height();jQuery("#content-streams").css("height",stream.height.open);break;}if("featured"!=tab && 110<stream.start){jQuery("#"+tab+"-posts .extend-posts").css("display","none");}},comments:function(){var queries=[],containers=[];jQuery(".in-scope-view .post-count").each(function(id,element){var url=jQuery(element).attr("data-url");if(!url){return;}queries.push({"id":id,"method":"count","q":"childrenof:'"+url+"' -source:Digg,FriendFeed,Twitter state:Untouched,ModeratorApproved children:2 -source:Digg,FriendFeed,Twitter state:Untouched,ModeratorApproved"});containers.push(element);});jQuery.get("http://api.echoenabled.com/v1/mux",{"appkey":"dev.discovery","requests":jQuery.object2JSON(queries)},function(response){jQuery.each(response,function(id, data){new Echo.Counter({"target":containers[id],"appkey":"dev.discovery","liveUpdates":false,"data":data});});jQuery(".in-scope-view .comments").each(function(id,element){if(0==jQuery(".post-count",this).html()){jQuery(element).remove();}else{jQuery(element).removeClass("none");}});},"jsonp");}};

img.alt: Must Watch The Fast N’ Loud First Look

div.a: Must Watch The Fast N’ Loud First Look

div.div: Motor mastermind Richard Rawlings and mechanical prodigy Aaron Kaufman of Gas Monkey Garage search for derelict classic cars. To some, the cars look like rust buckets, but to this crew they’re gold…and ready to be brought back to life ... … READ MORE

img.alt: Why it’s Good to Be Ken Read, Pro Sailor

div.a: Why it’s Good to Be Ken Read, Pro Sailor

div.div: Unique experiences deserve to be acknowledged. Give your friends’ most amazing photos the Good to Be You stamp of recognition on Facebook and ask them to share their triumphant moments with the world. Visit the Seagram’s Ginger Ale Facebook ... … READ MORE

img.alt: Download Music From The Devils Ride

div.a: Download Music From The Devils Ride

div.div: Yesterday, I was captioning video from The Devils Ride: Sinister Moves when I came upon a Web-exclusive scene of a band playing in the Laffing Devils clubhouse. “Holy crap,” I thought. “This is AWESOME. Who IS this?” Well, it’s ... … READ MORE

img.alt: Incredible Adventures That Sound Impossible, but are Completely Accessible

div.a: Incredible Adventures That Sound Impossible, but are Completely Accessible

div.div: Only when you’re faced with death do you feel most alive. At least that’s what I’ve thought on many of my adventure travels. I’ve been on a lot of adventure trips, and for me, the closer an experience brings ... … READ MORE
The discovery may change the way we imagine and depict dinosaurs. … READ MORE
With the help of the high-definition eyes of NASA's Solar Dynamics Observatory (SDO), the Venus aureole has been detected again. … READ MORE

img.alt: Need a Great Long Weekend Away? Head to Austin

div.a: Need a Great Long Weekend Away? Head to Austin

div.div: If you’re looking to spend a long weekend away from home this summer, consider heading down and hanging out for a few days in Austin, Texas. Despite its home in the Lone Star State, Austin, on the Colorado River, ... … READ MORE

img.alt: Must Watch: The Ice Cometh on Deadliest Catch

div.a: Must Watch: The Ice Cometh on Deadliest Catch

div.div: It’s winter in Dutch Harbor and the fleet prepares to go after Opilio crab. The season looks promising with the quota up and the price high, but winter is preparing to make its move! The fleet and the descending ... … READ MORE

img.alt: It’s a Bird, It’s a Plane, It’s a… Dead Cat? (Video)

div.a: It’s a Bird, It’s a Plane, It’s a… Dead Cat? (Video)

div.div: Some people turn to a pet cemetery when their beloved feline companions pass, but according to Sky News and the New York Daily News, one Dutchman turned to creativity — mixed in with a little bizarre. Artist Bart Jansen ... … READ MORE

Hey Classic Car Fans, are you excited for the premiere of Discovery’s newest show Fast N’ Loud ? So are we, but before it airs we’re hoping to get a little inspiration from our fans as we are exploring ... … READ MORE

div.p: Richard and Aaron travel to Missouri to buy the hot rod of their dreams!
Watch a super sneak peek of Head Games, premiering June 3, at 10pm.
These cut throat negotiators are ready to part with big money!
Check out which baseball legends signed this particular baseball.
Charles must face ONE last test before he's officially patched.
Danny Boy and Diamond meet with Gipsy to discuss his new club, Sinister Mob Syndicate.

div.script: jQuery.fn.filterOn=function(filter_field,values){return this.each(function(){var select=this;var options=[];jQuery(select).find("option").each(function(){options.push({value:jQuery(this).val(),text:jQuery(this).text()});});jQuery(select).data("options",options);jQuery(filter_field).change(function(){var options=jQuery(select).empty().data("options");var selected_val=jQuery(this).val();var haystack=values[selected_val];var blank_selection=(jQuery(this).val()=="")?true:false;jQuery.each(options,function(i){var option=options[i];if((blank_selection)||(option.value=="")||(jQuery.inArray(option.value,haystack)!==-1)){jQuery(select).append(jQuery("").text(option.text).val(option.value));}});});});}; jQuery("#trips-countries").filterOn("#trips-regions", {"Europe": ["France", "Greece", "Italy", "Norway", "Turkey"], "South Pacific": [], "Central America": ["Costa Rica", "Mexico"], "Arctic": ["Arctic"], "Space": [], "Africa": ["Botswana", "Kenya", "South Africa", "Tanzania", "Zambia"], "South America": ["Amazon", "Argentina", "Brazil", "Ecuador", "Galapagos", "Peru"], "Asia": ["Cambodia", "China", "India", "Nepal", "Thailand", "Tibet", "Vietnam"], "North America": ["United States"], "Antarctica": ["Antarctica"], "North Africa / Middle East": ["Egypt", "Jordan", "Morocco"]});

var infoMail={signUp:function(data){var address=data.email.value;if(!address||-1==address.indexOf("@")||-1==address.indexOf(".")||5>=address.length){jQuery(".newsletter-signup #email-box").val("Enter a valid email address");return false;}var pingImage=new Image();pingImage.src="http://ebm.cheetahmail.com/r/regf2?a=2&n=900&aid=88808939&RCODE=43&sub=95157578&email="+encodeURIComponent(address);jQuery(".newsletter-signup #email-box").val("Thanks for signing up.");return false;}};
